thoughts.text: The 'read_file' command can be used to read a file containing information about new updates or events happening in the Subway Surfers game. Let's use this command to read the '2022.txt' file and see if there are any new updates or events happening in the game.
thoughts.reasoning: Since we were not able to retrieve any useful information from the hyperlinks returned by the 'google' command, we can use the 'read_file' command to read a file containing information about new updates or events happening in the Subway Surfers game. This will allow us to stay up-to-date with the latest news about the game.
